bibl.title: A Conical Sundial from Abu Mina.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte

bibl.note: Excavations Inv. P 127. Conical sundial probably made in, and for Alexandria around the fourth century. Some sundials have been found in Egypt and Sudan (list, pp. 44-45).
KOSCIUK Jacek, A Conical Sundial from Abu Mina.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte 31 (1992) pp. 43-54, 5 figg. et pl. V.
